ReportSection.name: Intro
ReportSection.title: Intro
ReportSection.Instructions:
Criteria for Merit Increments, Tenure, and Promotion

Procedures for Annual Review of Performance

Standards for Faculty Service Officers

Guidelines for SPA and University Industry Relationships

Variance of Responsibilities

Select "Yes" and include details if you have a written Variation of Responsibilities agreement in place during the reporting year with, for example, non-standard percentage weights for research, teaching and service.

Reasons For Reduced Teaching

The Reasons for reduced teaching section lists any reasons (e.g., Sabbatical Leave, Medical Leave, Other) explaining your reduced teaching during the reporting year. If you select “Other”, you should enter an appropriate description. You may add a footnote to provide more information for any leave.

ATS Standards
ReportSection.Static:
Period: {time2date(CYCLE_START, F Y)} to {time2date(CYCLE_END, F Y)}

A staff member is required to submit an annual report covering the staff member's activities during the previous year; see Faculty Agreement or FSO Agreement or ATS Agreement. The information submitted will be used in arriving at decisions regarding salaries, tenure, and promotion.

If.If: In accordance with Article A2.01.2, I am writing to confirm the following proportion of University responsibilities for the annual review period[s] of {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, START_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)} to {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, END_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)}, {getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, ROLE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}.
If.ElseIf: In accordance with Article A2.01.2, I am writing to confirm the following proportion of University responsibilities for the annual review period[s] of {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, START_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)} to {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, END_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)}, during which period you will be holding the role of {getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, ROLE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}.
If.Else: In accordance with Article A2.01.2, I am writing to confirm the following proportion of University responsibilities for the annual review period[s] of {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, START_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)} to {time2date({getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, END_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}, F Y)}.

Teaching:{getText(RP_LETTER5, TABLE, TEACHING, {$user_id}, 1, 0, {$last_year})}%

Teaching:40%
Research:40%
Service:20%
Admin:0%
If.Static: If this is not correct, please discuss the issue with your chair and work together to develop an appropriate “Variances of Responsibility” memo

ReportItem.types: Select(Teaching a very large number of students,Managing a large number of TAs,Teaching a relatively large number of different courses,Coordinating with other instructors of multi-section courses,New course development,Redesign of an existing course,Redesign of an existing course,Scaling of an existing course amid growing enrollment,Authoring textbooks or chapters,Filming instructional videosCreating innovative course assignments,Serving in teaching-related administrative positions,Driving teaching-related initiatives on Department level,Mentoring current and onboarding new ATS members,Pedagogical research and innovation,Research that ensures currency within the discipline,Supervision and dissemination of original research with undergraduate students,Supervision and dissemination of original research with graduate students,Other Service)|Textarea

Else.ReportItem:
Reasons For Reduced Teaching (if applicable)

The teaching load of full-time ATS members (except for Max Wyman professors) is 7 courses per year (3-3-1-0 or 3-3-0-1). If in the past year, you were not teaching 7 courses, please describe the additional responsibilities that justify your reduced teaching load. {$item}

ReportItemSet.ReportItem:
(i) Course Design: If appropriate comment on
a. course objectives, resources, assignments, and assessments;
b. course redesign or improvements that you undertook; and
c. development of new materials. 		(ii) Instructional Practices: How did you ensure that your teaching preparation and methods facilitate learning? If appropriate comment on
a. suitability of in-person and virtual environments and use of education technology
b. availability of teaching assistants, accessibility accommodations, and other supports
c. scheduling of course meeting times and/or online module availability.
{$item}

ReportSection.name: HQP Supervision
ReportSection.title: HQP Supervision
ReportSection.Instructions:
HQP Publications

The publications should have your HQP listed as an author, but cannot include yourself as an author. If the authors are not being formatted correctly, click the author you wish to change and select what type of user they are. Note that this will only override the formatting for this author in this report. It is advised that the author be correctly associated with the output and have correct Basic Info history.

HQP Presentations

The Presentations section lists any presentations given by the user's hqp during the reporting year. The presentations cannot include yourself as a presenter, though you can be listed as a contributor.

ReportSection.name: Outputs
ReportSection.Instructions:
Publications

(Do not include publications that are in preparation. The names of your Highly Qualified Personnel (HQP) are bolded.)

If the authors are not being formatted correctly, click the author you wish to change and select what type of user they are. Note that this will only override the formatting for this author in this report. It is advised that the author be correctly associated with the output and have correct Basic Info history.

Presentations

The Presentations section lists any presentations given by the user during the reporting year.

(Do not include presentations given by your students or by others. HQP presentations are included on the Additional Info section.)

Patents/Spin-Offs

(Do not include publications that are in preparation. The names of your Highly Qualified Personnel (HQP) are bolded.)

If the authors are not being formatted correctly, click the author you wish to change and select what type of user they are. Note that this will only override the formatting for this author in this report. It is advised that the author be correctly associated with the output and have correct Basic Info history.

ReportSection.name: SPA
ReportSection.title: Supplementary Professional Activities ⓘ
ReportSection.Instructions: Type the information related to supplementary professional activities (refer to Article 3 of the Faculty Agreement or to Article 3 of the FSO Agreement). Include category/type of client or affiliation, nature of service performed, estimate of total time devoted, and names and nature of any continuing contractual arrangements with outside organizations. Refer to Article A3 of the Faculty Agreement or to Article B3 of the FSO Agreement or to Article D3 of the ATS Agreement.

ReportSection.name: Additional Info
ReportSection.title: Additional Info ⓘ
ReportSection.Instructions:
Additional Info

Type any other relevant information for your report. For example, you may add details about your publications, presentations given by your HQP responsibilities or by your collaborators (not by you). Include publications from Graduate Student research for which you are not a co-author, details of special interest on invited presentations or non-refereed publications, significant information about refereed publication venues, distinctions, projects initiated, special details about grants or contracts, unpaid consulting, letters of references for your HQPs, letters of nomination for awards for other individuals, etc.

(Include publications from Graduate Student theses (not co-authored), details of special interest on invited presentations or non-refereed publications, important information about refereed publication venues, distinctions, projects initiated, special details about grants and contracts, unpaid consulting, etc.)

Activities such as commercialization activities, contributions to professional and policy reports, public dissemination and knowledge translation activities may also be considered meritorious.

ReportSection.tooltip: PDF generation and submission to the FEC
ReportSection.name: Sign & Lock
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Once you are satisfied with the generated PDF, you can lock your annual report.

NOTE: If you have recently made changes to your report, you will need to generate a new pdf on the Review section
NOTE: You will be unable to make further changes after locking your annual report.

{$item}
